授業方法: The course will use a mixture of lectures, pair-work, group work, and presentations in teaching practical English skills.

第1回: Week 1 - Introductions: Course Explanation, Classroom Language, Technology Set-ups, Portfolio Explanations
第2回: Week 2 - Topic 1: Vocabulary Practice, Grammar Focus; Listening and Reading Practice
第3回: Week 3 - Topic 1: Conversation and Discussion Activities; Presentation Preparation; Presentations
第4回: Week 4 - Topic 2: Vocabulary Practice, Grammar Focus; Listening and Reading Practice
第5回: Week 5 - Topic 2: Conversation and Discussion Activities; Presentation Preparation; Presentations
第6回: Week 6 - Topic 3: Vocabulary Practice, Grammar Focus; Listening and Reading Practice
第7回: Week 7 - Topic 3: Conversation and Discussion Activities; Presentation Preparation; Presentations
第8回: Week 8 - Topic 4: Vocabulary Practice, Grammar Focus; Listening and Reading Practice
第9回: Week 9 - Topic 4: Conversation and Discussion Activities; Presentation Preparation; Presentations
第10回: Week 10 - Topic 5: Vocabulary Practice, Grammar Focus; Listening and Reading Practice
第11回: Week 11 - Topic 5: Conversation and Discussion Activities; Presentation Preparation; Presentations
第12回: Week 12 - Topic 6: Vocabulary Practice, Grammar Focus; Listening and Reading Practice
第13回: Week 13 - Topic 6: Conversation and Discussion Activities; Presentation Preparation; Presentations
第14回: Week 14 - Final Week:  Final Projects; Reflection and Discussion;

成績評価Grading0: 評価基準等　Grading Criteria etc.
成績評価Grading1: Classwork & Projects; There is no final examination(定期試験).

name: 【200】インテンシブ・イングリッシュ　３０／Intensive English
担当者: パリッシュ　Ｍ．Ｍ．（PARRISH MICHAEL M.）
